::Liono::
"Koj & Lilly gear up!"

::Koj::
Koj Grabs a group of holocubes "Inu I may need your fire power."

::Lilly::
Grabs a few holocubes. "Koj has a point."


::Inu::
"So be it." Inu starts to transforms into silver Dragon Tattoo that crawls 
up Koj's back as it opens his eyes.

::Tiamat::
Does the same only being Black and purple.

::Koj & Lilly::
Both at activate there Cloaks and jammers jump out of Hasaimon and start 
looking for a for away to enter the remains of the CF. Koj and Lilly  remain 
out of sight make one of the smaller holes large enough for them to enter. 
Both enter quickly and quietly doing and remaining well hidden as the take 
vantages to keep them out of scanning of the Alliance members but watching 
there every action.

::Liono::
Liono lands Hasaimon activates its defense grid."Wild C.A.T.S fall out."

::Wild C.A.T.S::
They exit.

::Liono::
Walks up to Iron Raptor "Not so easy being in Charge. You have our support 
in whatever you choose to do but choose wisely Iron Raptor."

::Dark::
Studies the Matrix in her hands and whispers to Rinoa a few things.
